mapper.select: SELECT n.id, n.title, n.inserted, m.nickName writerNickName, COUNT(r.noticeId) numOfReply FROM Notice n JOIN Member m ON n.memberId = m.id LEFT JOIN Reply r ON n.id = r.noticeId GROUP BY n.id ORDER BY n.id DESC LIMIT #{startFrom}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT id, title, content, memberId, inserted FROM Notice WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Notice (title, content, memberId) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{memberId})
